review: watch it! but only for the mesmerizing performance vidya balan gives. movie is very overhyped in terms of its direction and screen play. but man vidya really shines in each and every frame of this movie. emraan hashmi and naseer sir are just at par in terms of acting in this one. and yeah there is tushar kapoor too and you know the rest..
